<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_2" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_5</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_3" name="AA" pm:screenRef="1781" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_5</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_8</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_5" name="" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_3"/>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_6" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_10</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_4" name="BB" pm:screenRef="1783" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}" pm:validations="">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_8</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_10</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_8" name="" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_4"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_10" name="" sourceRef="node_4" targetRef="node_6"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmn:collaboration id="collaboration_0">
    <bpmn:participant id="node_1" name="Verify Multiple File Upload" processRef="ProcessId"/>
  </bpmn:collaboration>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="collaboration_0">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="80" y="115" width="700" height="465"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_2_di" bpmnElement="node_2">
        <dc:Bounds x="190" y="320" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="280" y="300" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_5_di" bpmnElement="node_5">
        <di:waypoint x="208" y="338"/>
        <di:waypoint x="338" y="338"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_6_di" bpmnElement="node_6">
